# Test vectors for FifoToHandShake ports
# 0 means force 0
# 1 means force 1
# L means expect 0
# H means expect 1
# X means donâ€™t care
########################
## Clock cycle = 10ns ##
########################
#time Rst   Clk   HS_AckTx  FIFO_DataOut(15:0)  FIFO_IsEmpty 
0     1     0     0         0000000000000000    1

65    0     1     0         0000000000000011    0
